headline: Ford, GM sales rise by 4% each in 2024, fueled by trucks and EVs
summary: Ford (F) and General Motors (GM) reported strong 2024 sales, both growing by over 4% for the year — marking their highest overall sales since 2019. Yahoo Finance senior reporter Pras Subramanian joins Market Domination hosts Josh Lipton and Josh Schafer to break down the growth seen across the automakers' trucks, SUVs, and EV sales figures. In this video above, Subramanian also discusses EV truck manufacturer Rivian's (RIVN) stock surge after meeting vehicle delivery targets. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. This post was written by Josh Lynch

headline: GM sales rise 4% in 2024, powered by trucks, SUVs, and EVs
summary: GM reported strong fourth quarter and full-year 2024 sales results in the US, capping off a strong year for the Big Three automaker. GM’s results come as crosstown rival Ford also saw sales gain in Q4 and for the year.

headline: GM sales, Rivian surges, Adobe price target: Market Minute
summary: Yahoo Finance host Madison Mills checks out several of this morning's top trending stocks as part of today's Market Minute. General Motors (GM) saw its fourth quarter sales rise 21%, while overall sales grew by 4% in 2024. Rivian (RIVN) shares are up by over 21% Friday morning after surging past fourth quarter EV delivery estimates. Lastly, UBS analysts cut their price target on Adobe (ADBE) to $475 per share from $525. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.
